mapper.sql: a.id, a.bom_id as "bom.id", b.bomName as "bom.bomName", a.mType, a.mNum, a.unit, a.del_flag, a.remarks, a.create_by as "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by as "updateBy.id", a.update_date
left join bas_bom b on b.id=a.bom_id
mapper.select: select from bas_bom_detail a where a.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} order by a.update_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into bas_bom_detail( id, bom_id, mType, mNum, unit, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) values ( #{id}, #{bom.id}, #{mType}, #{mNum}, #{unit}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: update bas_bom_detail set bom_id=#{bom.id}, mType=#{mType}, mNum=#{mNum}, unit=#{unit}, update_by=#{updateBy.id}, update_date=#{updateDate} where id=#{id}
